title: Is society objective or subjective? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi thanks for the request Nice question Societal learning, understandings, come from man teaching man. That means that it is ‘subjective’. Religion is even Subjective because like Society, it's rue still boils down to those same identifiers. Pure TRUTH in comparison is Objective, because it has no use for mortal teachers.
